announcements.details: Read the commentary on the readings for the 20th Sunday in Ordinary Time.
announcements.title: Commentary: 20th Sunday in Ordinary Time

announcements.details: There will be TWO masses on Sunday, 17th August, 2025. Offertory will be led by Saturday borns and the Christian Mothers Association respectively. Prayer of the faithful will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: 20th Sunday in Ordinary Time

announcements.details: Forms for the St Bakhita marriage school are still available. Prospective counselees who wish to have their marriages solemnized in 2026 should pick up registration forms from the office of the parish priest. Counselees who have already picked forms are encouraged to submit them as soon as possible.
announcements.title: Marriage School

announcements.details: Registration for UCMAS which is a child brain development programme is ongoing. Kindly register your child for a training in concentration, self-confidence and all-round academic proficiency. Contact 0242146843 to register.
announcements.title: UCMAS Brain Development Programme
